alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 6:24AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kane County through 715 AM MDT... At 623 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Kanab, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orderville and Coral Pink Sand Dunes. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 68 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
